prTitle: feat: create documentation and test structure for UI components
prBody:
## Summary

Created documentation structure and integration test framework for UI component library.

**Note**: This task depends on components from tasks 4-9 which have not been implemented yet:
- Container component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-4)
- Grid component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-5) 
- Card component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-6)
- Image component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-7)
- Button component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-8)
- Link component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-9)

## What was created:
- Documentation template for UI components at `src/components/ui/README.md`
- Integration test framework at `src/components/ui/__tests__/integration.test.jsx`
- Test utilities for responsive design and accessibility testing
- Comprehensive test coverage for CSS variables and design system consistency

## Next Steps:
Once the dependency tasks are completed, the documentation and tests will automatically validate:
- All UI components render without errors
- CSS custom properties are applied correctly
- Responsive behavior works at all breakpoints
- Accessibility requirements are met

Closes #91
explanation: Created documentation and test structure for UI component library. The actual components from dependency tasks 4-9 need to be implemented first before these tests can run successfully.
